integrations.title: Integrations

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.whatWouldYouLike: What would you like to do today?
aiAssistant.greeting: Hello! I'm your AI Assistant. Ask me to analyze leads, summarize pipeline activity, or highlight items that need attention.
aiAssistant.placeholderResponse: This is a placeholder response. In a future phase, I'll provide intelligent assistance based on the {{context}} context.

aiAutomations.title: AI Automations
aiAutomations.description: Automate communication and follow-ups across your most important channels.
aiAutomations.helperLine: These automations will integrate with your leads, pipeline, and AI Assistant.
aiAutomations.whatsappAutomationDesc: Automate WhatsApp messages for leads, follow-ups, and responses.
aiAutomations.emailAutomationDesc: Send automated emails for lead nurturing, updates, and follow-ups.
aiAutomations.instagramAutomationDesc: Automate responses and engagement for Instagram inquiries and messages.
aiAutomations.status: Configuration available in a future phase.
aiAutomations.whatsappConfig: Configure automated WhatsApp messaging rules and responses for leads and contacts.
aiAutomations.emailConfig: Configure automated email sequences and follow-ups for leads and contacts.
aiAutomations.instagramConfig: Configure automated responses and engagement for Instagram inquiries and messages.
aiAutomations.detailHelper: This automation will work together with your leads, pipeline, and AI Assistant.
aiAutomations.configurationPlaceholder: {{title}} configuration will be available in a future phase.
